text:
[Hanuman stops Vanaras running away from the battlefield. Terrific fight takes place between Vanaras and Rakshasas. Hanuman departs to Rama to inform him of Sita's killing by Indrajith. Departure of Indrajith to Nikumbhilam to offer oblations of blood in fire.]

श्रुत्वातुभीमनिर्ह्रादंशक्राशनिसमस्वनम् ।

वीक्षमाणादिशस्सर्वादुद्रुवुर्वानरर्षभा: ।।6.82.1।।
meaning: शक्राशनिसमस्वनम् whose roar was like thunder, भीमनिर्ह्रादम् terrible roar, श्रुत्वा hearing, वानरर्षभा bulls among Vanaras, वीक्षमाणाः looking at, सर्वाः all, दिशः directions, भृशम् at speed, दुद्रुवुः fled
translation: The bulls among Vanaras heard the roar which was like thunder and looking at Indrajith fled in all directions.

meaning: ततः thereafter, मारुतात्मजः Maruti's son, हनुमान् Hanuman, विषण्णवदनान् sad face, दीनान् piteous, त्रस्तान् in fear, पृथक् separately, विद्रवतः running away, तान् them, सर्वान् to all, उवाच said
translation: Thereafter, Maruti's son, Hanuman said to all Vanaras who were looking sad, piteous, feeling singly out of fear, and running away.

meaning: प्लवङ्गमाः monkeys, त्यक्तयुद्धसमुत्साहाः lost enthusiasm to fight, विषण्णवदनाःlooking sad, कस्मात् why, विद्रवध्वे running away, वः or, शूरत्वम् valour, क्व where, गतम् has it gone
translation: "O monkeys! Why have you lost enthusiasm to fight, looking sad and running away? Where has your valour gone?"

meaning: आहवे return, अग्रतःcome in front, यान्तम् close to, माम् me, पृष्ठतः, अनुव्रजध्वम् who won wars, अभिजनोपेतैः who were praised, शूरैः heroes, निवर्तितुम् returning, अयुक्तंहि not proper
translation: "Return and come in front, close to me and follow me. It is not proper for you to win wars and be praised."

meaning: धीमता wise, वायुपुत्रेण by Son of windgod, एवम् in that way, उक्ताः having spoken, हृष्टमानसाः delighted in mind, सुसङ्क्रुद्धाः great fury, शैलशृङ्गान् peak of mountain, द्रुमान् चैव and also trees, जगृहुः seized
translation: Wise son of wind god having spoken in that way, delighted in mind the Vanaras seized peaks of mountains and also trees in great fury.

meaning: वानरर्षभाः bull among Vanaras, गर्जन्तः roaring, राक्षसान् Rakshasas, अभिपेतुः surrounding, महाहवे in great fight, हनूमन्तम् Hanuman, परिवार्य Vanara leaders, अन्वयुःfollowed
translation: Surrounding Hanuman, the Vanara leaders followed him for a great fight.

meaning: सः he, हनुमान् Hanuman, तैः those, वानरमुख्यैः Vanara leaders, सर्वतंवृतः surrounded all over, अर्चिष्मान्, हुताशनःइव like flaming fire, शत्रुवाहिनीम् enemy troops, अदहत् consumed
translation: Hanuman went surrounded by Vanara leaders who resembled flaming fire and began to consume the enemy troops like flaming fire.

meaning: वानरसैन्येन Vanara army, वृतः surrounded, सःमहाकपिः that great monkey, कालान्तकयमोपमः like Yama the spirit of death, राक्षसानाम् Rakshasas, कदनम् havoc, चक्रे caused
translation: The Vanara army surrounded that great monkey, Hanuman, who was like Yama, the god of death and caused havoc to Rakshasas.

meaning: महता great, शोकेन sorrow, कोपेन च angry, अविष्टः overtaken, महाकपिः greatVanara, सःहनुमान् that Hanuman, रावणिरथे on the chariot of the son of Ravana, महतीम् huge, शिलाम् rock, पातयत् hurled
translation: Hanuman, overtaken by anger, filled with great sorrow hurled a huge rock at the chariot of Ravana's son.

meaning: तदा then, अपततनीम् fallen, ताम् that, दृष्टवैव seeing, विधेयाश्वसमायुक्तः yoked to obedient horses, रथःchariot, सारथिना chariot rider, विदूरम् long distance, अपवाहितः drove
translation: Then seeing that rock coming towards the chariot yoked to obedient horses, the chariot rider drove it to a long distance.

meaning: व्यर्थम् failed, उद्यत raised up, साशिला that rock, रथस्थम् to the chariot, सहसारथिम् along with charioteer, तम् him, इन्द्रजितम् Indrajith, अप्राप्य having not reached, धरणीम् on the earth, भित्त्वा cleaving, विवेश entered
translation: That rock hurled by Hanuman failed to reach the chariot in which Indrajith was seated and also the charioteer. It cleaved the earth and entered.

meaning: शिलायाम् rock, पतितायाम् fell, रक्षसाम् Rakshasas, चमूः troops, व्यथितः alarmed, निपतन्त्या on the battlefield, शिलया rock, राक्षसाः Rakshasas, भृशम् violently, मथिताःcrushed to death
translation: As the rock fell on the battlefield the Rakshasa troops got alarmed and were violently crushed to death.

meaning: महाकायाः of gigantic body, तेकाननौकसः those forest dwellers, शतशः hundreds, द्रुमांश्च trees, गिरिशृङ्गाणि peaks of mountains च also, उद्यताः raised up, नदन्तः making loud noise, तम् them, अभ्यधावन् fought
translation: Those gigantic forest dwellers in hundreds seizing trees and rocks lifted and fought making loud noise.

meaning: भीमविक्रमाः courageous, वानराः Vanaras, सङ्ख्ये inumerable, इन्द्रजितम् Indrajith, क्षिपन्ति discharged, प्लवङ्गमाः monkeys, वृक्षशलमहावर्षम् rained trees and rocks, विसृजन्तः throwing, शत्रूणाम् enemies, कदनम् on the battlefield, चक्रुःrolled, विविधैः numerous, स्वनैःtone, नेदुश्च shouting
translation: Courageous Vanaras, innumerable in number began to rain trees and rocks throwing on the enemies. The Rakshasas number rolled on the battlefield shouting in numerous tones.

meaning: घोररूपाः dreadful appearance, निशाचराः night rangers, महाभीमैः very fierce तैःवानरैः those Vanaras, वीर्यात् violently, वृक्षैः trees, अभिहताः beaten up, रणक्षितौ fell on battlefield, व्यचेष्टन्त hit one another
translation: Night rangers of dreadful appearance beaten up with trees by most fierce Vanaras, fell on the battlefield and struck one another.

meaning: इन्द्रजित् Indrajith, वानरार्दितम् tormented by Vanaras, स्वसैन्यम् his own army, अभिवीक्ष्य looking at, अथ and then, प्रगृहीतायुधः seizing weapons, क्रुद्धःangry, परान् enemies, अभिमुखःtowards, ययौwent
translation: Indrajith, looking at his own army tormented by the Vanaras, was enraged, and went towards the enemies' seizing weapons.

meaning: दृष्टविक्रमः unyielding valour, सः he, स्वसैन्येन by his own army, अभिसम्वृतः combined with, शरौघान् arrows, अवसृजन् let go, सुबहून् numerous, कपिशार्दूलान् tigers among monkeys, जघान struck
translation: Indrajith of unyielding valour, combining with his own army let go numerous arrows on the tigers of Vanaras and struck them.

meaning: आहवे in the battle, तस्य his, ते those, अनुचराः followers अपि also, शूलैःtridents, अशनिभिः Asanis, खङ्गै: swords, पट्टसै:, sharp edged spears, कूटमुद्गरैःkutamudgaras, वानरान् Vanaras, जघ्नुः struck
translation: In the battle, followers of Indrajith struck the Vanaras with tridents, asanis, swords, sharp edged spears, and kutamudgaras.

meaning: महाबलः endowed with great strength, हनूमान् Hanuman, सस्कन्धविटपैः trees with huge trunks and branches, शालैःrocks, शिलाभिश्च stones also, भीमकर्मणाम् of terrific task, रक्षसाम् Rakshasas, कदनम् war, चक्रे killed
translation: Hanuman, who was endowed with great strength, killed Rakshasas capable of terrific tasks with trees having large trunks and branches and stones also.

meaning: सःहनूमान् that Hanuman, परानीकम् enemy army, निवार्य retreat, तान्वनौकसःhis own army, अब्रवीत् spoke, सन्निवर्तध्वम् no use defeating this army, इदम् thus, बलम् army, नः not, साध्यम् possible, न not
translation: Hanuman made the enemy army retreat, and spoke to his own army," No use of defeating this army for us as our mission is not winning the army."

meaning: रामप्रियचिकीर्षवः What is pleasing to Rama, प्राणान् life, त्यक्त्वा giving up, विचेष्टन्तःmaking it knownयन्निमित्तम् for that sake, युध्यामः war, साजनकात्मजा that daughter of Janak, हता has been killed
translation: "To please Rama, we are giving up life. Let us make Rama know that the daughter of Janaka for whose sake we are fighting this war and giving up life has been killed."

meaning: इमम् this, अर्थम् fact, रामम् to Rama, सुग्रीवमेव च and Sugriva, विज्ञाप्य telling, तौ both, यत् that which, प्रतिविधास्येते knowing their reply, तत् that, वयम् we, करिष्यामहेwill do
translation: "On telling this fact (that Indrajith has killed Sita) to Rama and Sugriva and knowing their reply we will do what is to be done."

meaning: वानरश्रेष्ठः foremost of Vanaras, सर्ववानारन् all Vanaras, वारयन् keeping back, इति thus, उक्त्वा spoken, असंत्रस्तःfearless one, सबलः his army, शनैःशनैःslowly slowly, संन्यवर्तत retreated
translation: The foremost of the Vanaras, kept back all the Vanaras after speaking that way to the army and slowly and slowly retreated.

meaning: ततः thereafter, दुष्टात्मा evil minded, सःhe, राघवः Raghava, यत्र there, व्रजन्तम् sanctuary,, हनूमन्तं Hanuman, प्रेक्ष्य observing, होतुकामःdesiring to, निकुम्भिलाम् Nikumbhila, गतःwent
translation: Thereafter, observing Hanuman going to Raghava, the evil minded Indrajith went to Nikumbhilam desiring to offer oblations at the sanctuary.

meaning: इन्द्रजित् Indrajith, निकुम्भिलाम् Nikumbhilam, अधिष्ठाय reaching, पावकम् fire, जुहावpoured, ततः there upon, यज्ञभूम्याम् sacrificial ground, गत्वा went, तेनरक्षसा by that Rakshasa, हूयमानः offering to Devatas, पावकः fire, तदा then, मांसशोणितभुक् consuming blood oblations, प्रजज्वाल blazed
translation: Indrajith reaching Nikumbhilam, the sacrificial ground, poured oblation of blood into the sacrificial fire for Devatas and the fire blazed.

meaning: इन्द्रजित् Indrajith, निकुम्भिलाम् Nikumbhilam, अधिष्ठाय reaching, पावकम् fire, जुहावpoured, ततः there upon, यज्ञभूम्याम् sacrificial ground, गत्वा went, तेनरक्षसा by that Rakshasa, हूयमानः offering to Devatas, पावकः fire, तदा then, मांसशोणितभुक् consuming blood oblations, प्रजज्वाल blazed
translation: Indrajith reaching Nikumbhilam, the sacrificial ground, poured oblation of blood into the sacrificial fire for Devatas and the fire blazed.

meaning: अर्चिः flameपिनद्धः wrapped, होमशोणिततर्पितः swollen with the offering of blood into the sacrificial fire, समुत्थितः risen, सुतीव्रः very bright, अग्नि: fire, सन्ध्यागतःcovered by flames, आदित्यःइव like sun, ददृशे resembled
translation: The flame had swollen up with the offering of blood as oblation and risen. It was very bright and wrapped in the flames the fire resembled the sun.
